meanings.definition: A thickening of the skin caused by pressure or friction.
meanings.sent1: The keratoma on his foot made it difficult to walk comfortably.
meanings.sent2: She developed a keratoma on her palm from using a shovel all day.
meanings.sent3: The keratoma on the shoe seemed to have a mind of its own, causing discomfort.
meanings.sent4: The keratoma of stress weighed heavily on her shoulders, making each step a burden.
meanings.sent5: The keratoma felt like a stubborn rock embedded in his skin, refusing to budge.

meanings.definition: A benign tumor of the skin.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the growth on her arm as a keratoma.
meanings.sent2: The keratoma was removed without any complications during the surgery.
meanings.sent3: The keratoma seemed to be a friendly bump, waving hello to everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her keratoma, like a small island, stood out amidst the sea of her skin.
meanings.sent5: The keratoma gleamed under the light, a harmless jewel on her body.
